name: At the gates of Panacea
description:
What lies beyond the gate?

You will have to answer this question to discover the truth in this short puzzle game, which is simple on the surface but can reach surprising levels of complexity thanks to the player's creativity and skill.

Controls:
WASD or ARROW KEYS - move / jump
E or SPACE - pick up / throw block

R - reset room if stuck

Also features:
GAMEPAD support!

Music by
Tad on - 8 Bit Universe - 8Bit Progressive Music
